title: StartUP - Intelligent training needs assessment and Open Educational Resources to foster Entrepreneurship

author: Cristina Stefanelli, SOPHIA R&I
Edmundo Tovar Caro, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid

segmentation: The name of this project is startup.

Stopped up, stands for innovative training assessment to foster Entrepeneurship by means of open indication resources.

Ah.
The project started in January last year and it will last in August.
What we're trying to do is actually to develop a self directed learning and assessment program to develop an enterpreneur and mindset and scale.

Which doesn't mean that people who will take this course will start up a new business, but they will basically, well, we support them to develop an entrepreneurial mindset that is supposed to be useful in any of the fields of life, even if they are students or if they work in big organizations and things like this.
So we have three main objectives.

And behind this the third objective is to set up a peer review and sharing community to ensure the quality of the individual learning path by means of peer review.
